workspaces.description: BitCurator is an Ubuntu-based Linux distribution designed to support the needs of library, archive, and museum professionals processing born-digital materials.
workspaces.notes:
**⚠️ WARNING – IMAGE CURRENTLY UNDER TROUBLESHOOTING ⚠️**

This BitCurator 5 image is still being actively worked on and may exhibit issues. It includes a suite of open source disk imaging, digital forensics, and data analysis tools curated to support modern born-digital archival workflows. See the image’s information page for details.

workspaces.description: REMnux is a Linux toolkit for reverse-engineering and analyzing malicious software.
workspaces.notes:
**⚠️ WARNING – IMAGE CURRENTLY UNDER TROUBLESHOOTING ⚠️**

Do NOT use this image yet. REMnux is a Linux toolkit for reverse-engineering and analyzing malicious software. See the image’s information page for included tools.

workspaces.description: This is a custom Ubuntu 24.04 LTS build with DIND.
workspaces.notes: This is a custom Ubuntu 24.04 LTS build that gives Docker-in-a-Docker (DIND). It has both a develop and production version.

workspaces.description: This is a custom Ubuntu 24.04 LTS build with tools added for InfoSec professionals.
workspaces.notes: This is a custom Ubuntu 24.04 LTS build. For included applications see this image's information page. It has both a develop and production version.
